pages.text: $(item)Logistics Drones/$ are a special type of $(l:tools/drones)drone/$. They are a lower tier $(thing)Drone/$, since they are not programmable but limited to carrying out $(italic)only/$ logistics tasks.

pages.title: Automatic Charging
pages.text: As with all types of Drone, these drones require $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ to operate, and will automatically seek out $(l:tools/drone#charging)a Charging Station with a Dispenser Upgrade/$ if low on air.

Once deployed, a $(item)Logistics Drone/$ will operate on any inventory/tank with a $(l:logistics/frames)Logistics Frame/$ in a 33x33x33 cube centered on the block the drone was deployed at.$(p)Since these Drones frequently need to move items around, $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#speed)Speed/$ and $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#inventory)Inventory/$ upgrades are recommended for movement speed and carrying capacity.
